text: Food at Restaurant Vindaloo was absolutely delicious‚Äîauthentic flavors and generous portions! The ambience was cozy and inviting, perfect for a great dining experience. The staff were friendly, attentive, and provided excellent service. Everything from start to finish was top-notch. Highly recommended‚ÄîI‚Äôll definitely be back with friends! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Great ambience and prices are very much budget.

After seeing the ambulance it may feel like menu is expensive but the other way. I tried coffee ‚òï and üçµ tea here. Simply super tasty.

Staff are polite and courteous. Must visit restaurant in this vicinity.

A very grand 5 star look and ambience restaurant.
Sadly the food didn't meet it's look.
Thai Som Tam wasn't that good as I have ate many in Thai.
The biryani was dry but the mutton was tender.
The meat and prawn we ordered didn't have enough absorption of marination that made the taste of each dish plain.
The papadum wasn't crispy.

Bru coffee was ok and honey lemon was ok too
The mint lime juice was awesome 9/10

It was a disappointment in total as it was a recommendation from friends but end up heartbreaking

We ordered Veg Biryani, Hyderabadi mutton Biryani, and Vindaloo Chicken Biryani. Everything was absolutely delicious, and the flavors were incredible! A special mention to Pavithra for her attentive and amazing customer service‚Äîshe truly made our experience memorable. We will definitely pay our next visit soon . Thank you for a fantastic dining experience!

We are indian and we were in need of Indian food in Johor, Malaysia. The food of this hotel was so delicious üòã and we surprise to to know that in Johor Vindaloo hotel provides such great tasty food. The hotel ambience is also awesome. I recommend all Indians to visit this hotel and taste the food. I would especially like to talk about the Tomato soup, I have never tasted such yummy soup in my life.
